comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: Based on the other photos' locations in this portion of the Bain Collection, this is probably Châlons-sur-Marne (now Châlons-en-Champagne) in northern France.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Agence Meurisse original (Meurisse catalog number at lower left) at Gallica site has caption: Transports de blessés à Châlons-sur-Marne [which appears to be in error] [Transport of wounded to Châlons-sur-Marne } Publication date: 1914 gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b9041711x

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: bior and artolog:  Thanks for pointing out the location and original caption.  We'll incorporate some of this into the description next time we update.
